trans-unit.source: Provides collection support for a collection of document pages.
trans-unit.target: 提供文件頁面集合的集合支援。

trans-unit.source: The new page to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合中的新頁面。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new page to the page collection.
trans-unit.target: 將新的頁面加入至頁面集合。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index within the collection where the page was added.
trans-unit.target: 以零起始的索引，在其內將頁面加入集合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newPageContent" /> was passed as <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newPageContent" /> 已傳遞為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The page passed as <paramref name="newPageContent" /> already existed in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 以 <paramref name="newPageContent" /> 傳遞的頁面已經存在於集合中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the page collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面集合所包含的元素數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for iterating through the page collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可逐一查看頁面集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可用來逐一查看集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>
trans-unit.target: See <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: for other remarks about how enumerators should be used.
trans-unit.target: 如需其他備註應該使用列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the page to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之頁面的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" /> element at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得位於集合中指定索引處的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The page content element at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 位於集合中指定索引處的頁面內容項目。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfx-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfx-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.PageContentCollection.GetEnumerator" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 請改用類型安全的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.PageContentCollection.GetEnumerator" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式。
